column4: Anyone know a good article or whatnot about setting up a LAMP on my Desktop so that I could use it to try out something like Joomla?
easy.. download the server version and when installing it (in a VM or otherwise) it will ask if you want a lamp install.. say yes. 20 mins later you're ready to install joomla..
of course if I missed the point of installing lamp on your current ubuntu machine that's a little different.
if you're already running ubuntu you can just install mysql and php5 and apache2
